definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Part 4 Liao River Basin Water Pollution Prevention recommendations to improve the legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是遼河流域水污染防治。

sentences.english: Tropez. And in many places, swimming is dangerous because of pollution.
sentences.chinese: 在許多地方，由於水污染游泳很危險。

sentences.english: Based on those works, the water pollution controlling project of the reservoir was established.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，提出了漳澤水庫水污染控制的方案。

sentences.english: Scientists are conducting sampling to understand the threats from water pollution.
sentences.chinese: 科學家正在進行取樣，從而理解來自水污染的威脅。

sentences.english: Some countermeasures and suggestions for pollution control are also proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了控制府河雙流段水污染的對策建議。

sentences.english: To bring the pollution under permant coutrol, sustainable development strategy must be carried out.
sentences.chinese: 要實現淮河水污染的根治，必須實施可持續發展戰略。

sentences.english: There has been a rapid development of the construction of Shanghai water pollution control projects recently.
sentences.chinese: 近幾年上海市水污染控制工程建設發展較快。

sentences.english: The water resource of Xuchang city is being short severely and is polluted seriously.
sentences.chinese: 許昌市水資源嚴重短缺，而且水污染嚴重。

sentences.english: But you can see from the visit, it focuses on topics like water pollution.
sentences.chinese: 你們從訪問日程上看出，重點在水污染等課題上。

sentences.english: Water contamination was to blame for the norovirus outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 所以，這次病毒感染是水污染引起的，應表述爲。

sentences.english: Instead of high yield, however, they got water and air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 然而，沒有得到高產量，卻造成了水污染和空氣污染。

sentences.english: The central government provided financial support for 691 projects to prevent and control water pollution in major river valleys.
sentences.chinese: 中央政府投資支持重點流域水污染防治項目691個。

sentences.english: The non-porous surface of the fiberglass prevents it from being contaminated by the water.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃鋼表面無孔，可防止被水污染。

sentences.english: The local standards for the discharge of water pollutants must be reported to the environmental protection department of the State Council for the record.
sentences.chinese: 地方水污染物排放標準須報國務院環境保護部門備案。

sentences.english: Oil and grease wastewater is one of the most widespread environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 油脂廢水是一種重要的水污染源。

sentences.english: Check and service the gear oil frequently when water contamination is possible.
sentences.chinese: 檢查和服務時經常齒輪油水污染是可能的。
